st:Description.name: CkeTolerance
st:Description.st:role: Defines some options for the Report generation
st:Description.st:detailedRole: Enable the user to deal with these categories of options: Tolerance, Length and Angle

st:attribute.Name: defaultTolerance
st:attribute.st:role: Enables the user to specify default values for length and angle if set to true
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Enables the user to specify default values for length and angle if set to true

st:attribute.Name: maxLengthTolerance
st:attribute.st:role: Enables you to assign a maximum tolerance length
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Enables you to assign a maximum tolerance length

st:attribute.Name: minLengthTolerance
st:attribute.st:role: Enables you to assign a minimum tolerance length
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Enables you to assign a minimum tolerance length

st:attribute.Name: maxAngleTolerance
st:attribute.st:role: Enables you to assign a maximum tolerance angle
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Enables you to assign a maximum tolerance angle

st:attribute.Name: minAngleTolerance
st:attribute.st:role: Enables you to assign a minimum tolerance angle
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Enables you to assign a minimum tolerance angle
